title: Strengthening Teaching Practical Competencies: Inclusive Education Design Workshop Utilizing Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Design and develop at least three types of learner-customized educational content using generative AI tools.
Apply a two-stage or more bias review process for AI-generated outputs.
Develop at least one instructional scenario applying the iterative design cycle (Plan-Do-Check-Act).
Identify three or more ethical dilemmas in AI-driven instructional design and propose solutions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
